data.eml:eml: A review of the cicada genus Kosemia Matsumura (Hemiptera: Cicadidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qi, Shengping, Hayashi, Masami, Wei, Cong (2015): A review of the cicada genus Kosemia Matsumura (Hemiptera: Cicadidae). Zootaxa 3911 (4): 451-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3911.4.1
